trans-unit.source: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Contiene proprietà che vengono utilizzate per vincolare il set di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A SqlTrackingQueryOptions contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method against the tracking data in a database used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Un SqlTrackingQueryOptions contiene proprietà che vengono utilizzate per vincolare il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>oggetti restituito dal <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per i dati di rilevamento in un database utilizzato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> in the collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the SqlTrackingQueryOptions.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>nella raccolta di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>deve corrispondere a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro che contiene i dati di rilevamento associati nel database che soddisfa le condizioni specificate dalle proprietà del SqlTrackingQueryOptions.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Valore | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>| Un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>| Un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>| Un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). | Questi valori indicano che una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>deve restituire un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>oggetto per ogni istanza del flusso di lavoro che dispone di dati nel database di rilevamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resets the properties of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Reimposta le proprietà di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> ai valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Valore | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>| Un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>| Un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>| Un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). | Questi valori indicano che una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>deve restituire un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>oggetto per ogni istanza del flusso di lavoro che dispone di dati nel database di rilevamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref:System.DateTime>che specifica il limite massimo del periodo di tempo che, insieme a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, viene utilizzato per vincolare il set di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and StatusMaxDateTime, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Vincola il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>oggetti restituiti da una chiamata <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>alle istanze del flusso di lavoro con l'oggetto <xref:System.Type>specificato, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>che have lo stato specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>durante il periodo specificato e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>StatusMaxDateTime e che dispongono di dati estratti che corrisponde a almeno uno degli <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>oggetti specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMaxDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DateTime>valore specificato da StatusMaxDateTime è inclusivo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla modalità di corrispondenza lo stato di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro, vedere il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se `WorkflowStatus` è impostato su null, quindi `StatusMaxDateTime` e `StatusMinDateTime` vengono ignorati.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Verranno restituite tutte le istanze del flusso di lavoro quando `GetWorkflows` viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.DateTime>che specifica il limite massimo del periodo di tempo utilizzato per far corrispondere le istanze del flusso di lavoro con uno stato specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref:System.DateTime>che, insieme a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, viene utilizzato per vincolare il set di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by StatusMinDateTime and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Vincola il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>alle istanze del flusso di lavoro che dispongono di <xref:System.Type>specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, il cui stato specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>durante il periodo specificato da StatusMinDateTime e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che dispongono di dati corrispondenti ad almeno uno degli <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>oggetti specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> estratti</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMinDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DateTime>valore specificato da StatusMinDateTime è inclusivo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla modalità di corrispondenza lo stato di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro, vedere il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se `WorkflowStatus` è impostato su null, quindi `StatusMaxDateTime` e `StatusMinDateTime` vengono ignorati.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Verranno restituite tutte le istanze del flusso di lavoro quando `GetWorkflows` viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.DateTime>che specifica il limite inferiore del periodo di tempo utilizzato per far corrispondere le istanze del flusso di lavoro con uno stato specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un elenco di valori per l'estrazione dei dati che vengono utilizzate per vincolare il set di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by TrackingDataItems.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Vincola il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>alle istanze del flusso di lavoro che hanno il <xref:System.Type>specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, il cui stato specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>durante il periodo specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che sono dati estratti corrispondenti ad almeno uno del <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>oggetti specificati dal TrackingDataItems.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>può contenere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>record contenenti i dati estratti dal flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The TrackingDataItems property contains <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects that specify certain values for this extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Contiene la proprietà TrackingDataItems <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>gli oggetti che specificano determinati valori per i dati estratti.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> and TrackingDataItems is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the TrackingDataItems property for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object to be returned for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Se l'istanza del flusso di lavoro soddisfa gli altri criteri specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>e TrackingDataItems non è un riferimento null (`Nothing`), i dati estratti archiviati nel database per un'istanza del flusso di lavoro devono corrispondere a uno o più dei valori di dati estratti specificati dalla proprietà TrackingDataItems per un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>oggetto da restituire per l'istanza del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If TrackingDataItems is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.
trans-unit.target: Se TrackingDataItems è un riferimento null (`Nothing`), il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>gli oggetti restituiti non saranno vincolati dai valori dei dati estratti per alcune delle istanze del flusso di lavoro nel database.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"></xref> objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"> </xref> che contiene gli oggetti specificano i valori devono corrispondere i dati estratti dall'istanza del flusso di lavoro o un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> value that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> valore utilizzato per vincolare il set di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by WorkflowStatus during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Vincola il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>alle istanze del flusso di lavoro che dispongono di <xref:System.Type>specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, il cui stato specificato da WorkflowStatus durante il periodo specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che dispongono di dati corrispondenti ad almeno uno degli <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>oggetti specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> estratti</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches WorkflowStatus if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> value specified by WorkflowStatus.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene considerata uno stato corrispondente WorkflowStatus se l'ultima <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>ricevuto per tale istanza del flusso di lavoro prima o durante il periodo di tempo relativo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà impostata su un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valore che esegue il mapping al <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>valore specificato da WorkflowStatus.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance must have a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is configured for the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>del flusso di lavoro istanza deve avere un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>che è configurato per l'oggetto appropriato <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>valore.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched.
trans-unit.target: Solo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>è possono far corrispondere i valori che sono stati inviati i record di rilevamento del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se nessun record di rilevamento del flusso di lavoro è stato inviato per l'istanza del flusso di lavoro, l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene considerato uno stato di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente viene illustrato il mapping tra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valori e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>valori.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: |TrackingWorkflowEvent value|WorkflowStatus value| |---------------------------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| If WorkflowStatus is null (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: | Valore TrackingWorkflowEvent | Valore WorkflowStatus | |---------------------------------|--------------------------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| Se WorkflowStatus è null (`Nothing`), il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>gli oggetti restituiti non saranno vincolati dallo stato; in altre parole, un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>oggetto verrà restituito per tutte le istanze del flusso di lavoro che corrispondono ai parametri specificati da altre proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> values or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> valori o null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The default is null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow instance <xref:System.Type> that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'istanza del flusso di lavoro <xref:System.Type>che viene utilizzato per vincolare il set di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by WorkflowType, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Vincola il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>gli oggetti restituiti da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>alle istanze del flusso di lavoro che dispongono di <xref:System.Type>specificato da WorkflowType, con lo stato specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>durante il periodo specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che dispongono di dati corrispondenti ad almeno uno degli <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>oggetti specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> estratti</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If WorkflowType is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by workflow <xref:System.Type>; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Se WorkflowType è un riferimento null (`Nothing`), il set di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>oggetti restituiti non saranno vincolati dal flusso di lavoro <xref:System.Type>in altre parole, un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>oggetto verrà restituito per tutte le istanze del flusso di lavoro che soddisfa i parametri specificati da altre proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).
